title: 1.13 Exodus I: Egypt, Ho!
itunes:title: Exodus I: Egypt, Ho!
description: We conclude the story of the patriarchs with a happy reunion between Jacob and his son Joseph, now an important minister in the Egyptian government. His family move to Egypt for a few centuries, a passage of time that passes in the blink of an eye. That concludes our survey of Genesis. We move on to the book of Exodus, amd introduce the great hero of the Hebrews, Moses.
content:encoded: We conclude the story of the patriarchs with a happy reunion between Jacob and his son Joseph, now an important minister in the Egyptian government. His family move to Egypt for a few centuries, a passage of time that passes in the blink of an eye. That concludes our survey of Genesis. We move on to the book of Exodus, amd introduce the great hero of the Hebrews, Moses.
itunes:subtitle: Jacob's family move to Egypt. 430 years later their many descendants find themselves enslaved
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
